mapper.insert: INSERT INTO employee (birthday, phone, start_work, full_name, city) VALUES (#{birthday}, #{phone}, #{start_work}, #{full_name}, #{city})
mapper.select: SELECT employee.id AS e_id, employee.birthday AS e_birthday, employee.phone AS e_phone, employee.start_work AS e_start_work, employee.full_name AS e_full_name, employee.city AS e_city, proj.id AS proj_id, proj.name AS proj_name, proj.description AS proj_description, pres.id AS pres_id, pres.name AS pres_name, pres.link AS pres_link, pres.description AS pres_description FROM employee JOIN project proj ON employee.project_id = proj.id JOIN present pres ON employee.id = pres.employee_id WHERE employee.id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE employee SET birthday = #{birtday}, phone = #{phone}, start_work = #{start_work}, full_name = #{full_name}, city = #{city}
